sn14.12:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, sanidānaṃ uppajjati kāmavitakko, no anidānaṃ;
sn14.12:5.4: Kāmadhātuṃ, bhikkhave, paṭicca uppajjati kāmasaññā, kāmasaññaṃ paṭicca uppajjati kāmasaṅkappo, kāmasaṅkappaṃ paṭicca uppajjati kāmacchando, kāmacchandaṃ paṭicca uppajjati kāmapariḷāho, kāmapariḷāhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati kāmapariyesanā.
sn14.12:5.5: Kāmapariyesanaṃ, bhikkhave, pariyesamāno assutavā puthujjano tīhi ṭhānehi micchā paṭipajjati—
sn14.12:6.1: Byāpādadhātuṃ, bhikkhave, paṭicca uppajjati byāpādasaññā, byāpādasaññaṃ paṭicca uppajjati byāpādasaṅkappo … pe …
sn14.12:6.5: byāpādapariyesanaṃ, bhikkhave, pariyesamāno assutavā puthujjano tīhi ṭhānehi micchā paṭipajjati—
sn14.12:7.6: vihiṃsāpariyesanaṃ, bhikkhave, pariyesamāno assutavā puthujjano tīhi ṭhānehi micchā paṭipajjati—
sn14.12:8.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso ādittaṃ tiṇukkaṃ sukkhe tiṇadāye nikkhipeyya;
sn14.12:8.2: no ce hatthehi ca pādehi ca khippameva nibbāpeyya.
sn14.12:8.3: Evañhi, bhikkhave, ye tiṇakaṭṭhanissitā pāṇā te anayabyasanaṃ āpajjeyyuṃ.
sn14.12:8.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yo hi koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā uppannaṃ visamagataṃ saññaṃ na khippameva pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti, so diṭṭhe ceva dhamme dukkhaṃ viharati savighātaṃ saupāyāsaṃ sapariḷāhaṃ;
sn14.12:8.5: kāyassa ca bhedā paraṃ maraṇā duggati pāṭikaṅkhā.
sn14.12:9.1: Sanidānaṃ, bhikkhave, uppajjati nekkhammavitakko, no anidānaṃ;
sn14.12:10.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, sanidānaṃ uppajjati nekkhammavitakko, no anidānaṃ;
sn14.12:10.4: Nekkhammadhātuṃ, bhikkhave, paṭicca uppajjati nekkhammasaññā, nekkhammasaññaṃ paṭicca uppajjati nekkhammasaṅkappo, nekkhammasaṅkappaṃ paṭicca uppajjati nekkhammacchando, nekkhammacchandaṃ paṭicca uppajjati nekkhammapariḷāho, nekkhammapariḷāhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati nekkhammapariyesanā;
sn14.12:10.5: nekkhammapariyesanaṃ, bhikkhave, pariyesamāno sutavā ariyasāvako tīhi ṭhānehi sammā paṭipajjati—
sn14.12:11.1: Abyāpādadhātuṃ, bhikkhave, paṭicca uppajjati abyāpādasaññā, abyāpādasaññaṃ paṭicca uppajjati abyāpādasaṅkappo … pe …
sn14.12:11.4: abyāpādapariyesanā, abyāpādapariyesanaṃ, bhikkhave, pariyesamāno sutavā ariyasāvako tīhi ṭhānehi sammā paṭipajjati—
sn14.12:12.1: Avihiṃsādhātuṃ, bhikkhave, paṭicca uppajjati avihiṃsāsaññā, avihiṃsāsaññaṃ paṭicca uppajjati avihiṃsāsaṅkappo, avihiṃsāsaṅkappaṃ paṭicca uppajjati avihiṃsāchando, avihiṃsāchandaṃ paṭicca uppajjati avihiṃsāpariḷāho, avihiṃsāpariḷāhaṃ paṭicca uppajjati avihiṃsāpariyesanā;
sn14.12:12.2: avihiṃsāpariyesanaṃ, bhikkhave, pariyesamāno sutavā ariyasāvako tīhi ṭhānehi sammā paṭipajjati—
sn14.12:13.1: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso ādittaṃ tiṇukkaṃ sukkhe tiṇadāye nikkhipeyya;
sn14.12:13.2: tamenaṃ hatthehi ca pādehi ca khippameva nibbāpeyya.
sn14.12:13.3: Evañhi, bhikkhave, ye tiṇakaṭṭhanissitā pāṇā te na anayabyasanaṃ āpajjeyyuṃ.
sn14.12:13.4: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, yo hi koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā uppannaṃ visamagataṃ saññaṃ khippameva pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gameti, so diṭṭhe ceva dhamme sukhaṃ viharati avighātaṃ anupāyāsaṃ apariḷāhaṃ;
sn14.12:13.5: kāyassa ca bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugati pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
